snippet: LEAD: ''Don't leave me - I don't want to die in here,'' a woman cried out to a San Francisco firefighter while trapped in a collapsed three-story apartment building about half an hour after the earthquake hit here Tuesday afternoon....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''Don't leave me - I don't want to die in here,'' a woman cried out to a San Francisco firefighter while trapped in a collapsed three-story apartment building about half an hour after the earthquake hit here Tuesday afternoon.

headline.main: In a Collapsed Building, Heroism and the Promise of a Cup of Coffee

byline.original: Special to The New York Times
